nodes.text: Bounty Emporium was a store for bounty hunters active during the Clone Wars. It was established on the world of Orondia, as well as in Pons Ora, a settlement on Abafar.

Bounty Emporium was first mentioned on a sign appearing in "Friends and Enemies," the sixteenth episode in the fourth season of Star Wars: The Clone Wars. The Emporium later appeared as a building in "Missing in Action," the twelfth episode of the fifth season.
